展开代码 <div id="divDatas"> <div></div> </div> <button class="btn btn-confirm">加载</button> <script type="text/javascript"> $(function() { var url = '/html/components/loading-layer/loadTable.html'; $("button").click(function(){ $('#divDatas').loadWithZoneLayer(url, null, function (data, myLayer) { myLayer.setMessage('加载成功...'); setTimeout(function(){ myLayer.close(); },1000); }, false); }); }); </script>
